No nudity, no sex, but prostitution.

Three scenes. The first I was travelling with 菩萨, mending romantic affairs of people, and end up discovering her own troubles. Much happened. Not recorded. It was quite **special**.

The second scene was back in secondary school during long lunch break and people keep talking and there were many events happening including chemistry lab and selling vaccine and medicines. Talked with many of the earlier female friends, revisited the friendly memory. It was not romance, and we were close. Bodily close.

The third scene was I was visiting a prostitution house, at first not realizing, but went their as sort of routine of school, which turns out gave been turned into a student run prostitution institute. Cheryl guided me about how others can live better this way. She was pretty with her usual make up. **Her index and middle fingers danced on my fingers**, complaining a bit about me not knowing much but telling me rest assured she can find her "sisters" no more than 4 years older than me that might be interested in me. She told me for a bit more interesting play she would use oral and other common techniques, but as a beginner I can just make it easy. Looking at her, I wondered, *maybe all pretty girls survived this way*.

Much other details are not recorded. The above brief is only recorded due to their uniqueness. English is chosen for this dream so it's a little obsecure (to mundane Chinese). This is because yesterday I had a suspicion that one, *not matter how much he loved the culture of his country, cannot expect to be understood by Chinese people after all*. (And thus probably for **Project Nine** we should aim at English community-first as well)






许锐灿跟我是同学，语文课上老师让语文课代表朗诵文章，似乎是为了挑选鼓励其他同学积极参加一个朗诵竞赛。我拿起一本新学期的书随手翻了一篇文章就准备开始读（标题和那一页几行话Lost）、老师说别别，还是选个学过的内容。许锐灿有些醉意、有些horny、往我身上蹭，课间我很bold的把手伸入他外衣内。惊讶里面是平的（昨晚电梯上一个皮肤还不错的姑娘就很平、当时联想到Cheryl和其他某自己挺喜欢女生也是如此）。后来电话有联系。说到这儿我记得好像刘也电话联系了。（Dream Perception）这儿说到梦的over writing特性：此梦之后对许锐灿这个人物一下子多了可以sexual attention的capacity，或许不再拒绝成为romance partner。

--

（大梦）跟老妈、老妹（可能也可能不）、还有其他一行人（可能有Jerry、也可能不）（印象差不多三五个）（其中有个跟自己挺来栽的、也挺Capable的人——可能是丁祖楠）

询问身边人是都有哪里不对劲，是我或者是另一个人提到、莫非我们刚刚中了幻术？可是现在小樱不在这儿（而且我们似乎也完全不会在忍者世界），该如何从幻术中脱身？我或者是另一个人引路、决定不妨就探一个究竟、到底对方想要什么。我想起Rick and Morty里面有一集外星人制造了虚拟现实需要计算机模拟、心念不知道幻术是否也需要到大量的计算资源，还是说纯粹发生于我们的脑海中——如果是如此那是如何可以做到所有的参与者都看到一样的幻术场景？当我们在幻境中移动的时候，现实中的我们是在跟着移动，还是处于沉睡状态？这一个废旧街区看起来地方可不小、是否每个地方都可以无限制的去、那现实中对应的区域该有多大？

记得“刚来”的时候当时老爸在开一辆Van我们经过了那个Monkey（红色警戒启发？）装饰的建筑（隔着视线两条街之后侧前方一座3-5层楼高的棕色建筑）、我看到那个确认了我们这是回到了之前“不正常”的环境之中。

。。。。

（这儿跳过一大段对于场景细节的描述，主要包括：刚出来的时候对于街道和异常的质疑、地面上破旧废弃但仍有人烟并且部分事物还挺干净崭新的混合丰风格、向右转向左转和初期的地面胡乱走动探索、快进入到建筑时经过的街道、离开建筑时看到的景象）

外面是破旧的玻璃墙壁办公大楼，我们在里面（和几个遇到的非人？）吃Pizza和别的东西、脑海中依稀想到自己要吃素食和健康食物来的。旁边的人吐槽我（尤其是几个遇到的非人）不该把这种特定的Pizza和那种特定的类似Root Bear或者Dr. ？？？（命运石之门里面那种饮料）、包装颇为花哨的汽水一起喝，但是我觉得这样味道挺好。吃着吃着我逐渐发现另外三个伙伴怎么好像越来越没有力气了、在那几个遇到的陌生人吐槽中我突然想到他们是不是故意的、而这就是幻术的目的为了削弱我们。我赶紧让同伴们也这样吃、一边警惕这样的建议会引起violence。不过还好他们没有多说什么。

后来我们似乎乘坐了某种交通工具离开大楼、似乎湖水有所变化但是不记得。

--

时间关系这个大梦不容多记。以下为要素：1）此梦境出场（梦境原生）人物众多，所见细致观察穿著相近和各异的女郎就有至少2-7（在于所专注时长）个、背景女郎无数，在我上楼梯的时候遇到的保安和侍应人员就有3-5个、但是楼梯上似乎出了我没什么别的visitor，后面我具体访问房间前路过的女郎和女性顾客依稀记得的有两个（一个白色衣服）、房间中后来回来的有三个（长相一般，穿着还挺好），2）此梦境对话颇多而且内容细致（全部遗失），主要包括：进入Club之前门口的侍应女生说的话（英文）、楼梯路上碰到安全人员可能有的对话、在房间里跟后来进来的三个女生的对话（中/英文？），3）整个目光所过之处Club内饰大气精致、但是因为现在难以recall地面楼梯和房间四周之外场景细节我对这一点开始感到不确定。4）在房间里面的类似于唱歌（但是没有话筒和电视机）环境中三个姑娘（不确定之前是不是有别人、没有带物件的表演者或许）的放在coach上的外套和宝宝以及里面的东西很细致（没有来得及细看的其他两个人的不记得也因此不确定，但是来得及细看的那个大包里面依稀记得有许多女生携带的东西、以及一大把打印的纸张）

（大梦）Alley、stare、name、boss、no access csrd，successful business man、many room、（uncontrolled）lucid dream、stare article print paper, hold door, hide objects, fancy door decoration, wall declaration, carpets. Large room, drinks? I might have been to somewhere similar to this before.

当时我差不多有点感觉到这个场景的梦境本质，但是并没有印象清晰深刻到激发主动影响的清明梦。那个女生包中丰富的东西一下吸引了我的注意，对于原来上来找那个谁、到底在几号房间、为什么没有直接引导我上来和为什么人转眼就不见了的问题抛之九霄云外。包包里似乎有耳机和小熊但是吸引我的是一叠打印纸，侧放在包中的纸上第一页有一个似乎是学术相关的标题，我猜想要么是学习资料要么是完成的论文要么就是其他阅读等。当时拿出来第一张纸仔细阅读了一下——我不记得是否时间特别紧张了但是很明显的没有去太细致阅读和记忆（造梦之术：想来外出游玩看到杂志或者公司闲放打印纸只一瞥我们也不能够记住许多、这一方面可以训练），满页的文字、尤其让我惊讶的是当时拿出来看一方面是为了验证和破坏梦的integrity、因为文字（据说）是一个challenge。但是首先文字并没有变不稳定、而文法等因为现在不记得所以不知道当时是否也通顺。

--

Remark：想法是简单在Universal Diary记录就算了，但那恐怕没什么意义，所以此处简记、以及annnotate。

Remark: 

1. One unfortunate and important part of this dram was the texts on the note.
2. The raw note itself is not readable to general audience.






丢失一些歌手和歌名（有一个歌手艺名有12个字，是三个四字短语例如”？？？？ ？？？？ 惆怅男孩“、以及疑似Original的歌曲旋律和歌词（“夏雨蒙蒙我？？？？情深～”11235432213etc，80年代）（我直接以为是在Mi上但是好似在Do上听起来更正确些）——想起来细致去听记已经醒来。

一直在跟黄氏发消息、写邮件和对话。

梦的最后我们在一个类似于小寺庙、日式道场、家、学校宿舍的混合的地方，背景一直在播放将近三个以上不同歌手不同歌曲，我听着还以为是父亲那个年代的歌（醒来发现不完全一样）。穿过一片竹林、pebble小路有一个门外乌黑、里面有星点金色烛光的室/堂，好奇过去看一眼。我在一处取出某日语经文观赏，黄氏好奇也过来看。

后来房间中灯光不好（或者被我不小心关了），我去重新开关灯。她跟我说你开灯别把我这儿桌子上的打开呀我在看电视。这是旁边来了另外一个男生。

（Topic，Undeveloped）当你跟一个人真的并不那么熟悉时（什么叫做“不熟悉”？其实我们说不定挺熟。改为：当你爱的人蹙眉不满时），你醒来想念她的究竟是什么？

其实就是有些想念她，然后没有然后。我或许该多读点文学，it's hard。

# 梦的特点

梦的特点，因其有限的”记忆Recall“ capacity，带给人very specific ideas。区别于现实中遍历场景的overwhelming detail，梦中更能够吸引人的是”原本就更关注的“那些事物和情感线索。

我们以前有个说法叫”梦生镜界“，指的就是那一种近乎纯粹（到执念）的感情思想。例如很久以前的Dream Era，跟梦生人物的“刹那永恒”静谧镜界。这样一种情感似乎具有其自身的艺术级别，尚且待发掘。

但是梦中的事物必须被隔离，因为这样一种纯粹的情感因失其复杂和内涵而在现实世界中是难以生存的。尤其当一个人本不具有卓越的优势时。

# Reference Study Skill （造梦之术 Subject）

1. Memory歌词、旋律、歌手名称
2. 简谱记述
3. 寺庙结构词汇
4. 旋律、音律、音准






It was a bad night's sleep. I went to bed late last night because I wasnt sleepy last night until 12:30 (because I slept for over 9 hours the previous night) and I was excited (in a very MC-specialized slightly-suprrssed way) thinking about I am going back to school and taking another PEY stuff. So my mind couldn't really rest and it seemed for a long time I had vivid thoughts going on in my mind (and it's not a loop dream, I simply wasn't falling asleep deep enough).

Hu and Liang were there at my room... I won't recall exactly what we talked about and what they did but there is nothing "special" - at that moment I was just natural and they seem to either live there or come to visit me a lot - and oh they are not lovers nor too intimate to make me feel uncomfortable. But Hu was mentioning something (which I won't recall) and it seemed about organizing stuff. Let's be sure - it's very important and affected my later decisions that's why I have to mention here name here but I won't recall.

I looked outside the window once before later actions, and **felt deeply uncertain whether I am dreaming or not, and dare not wasting my life trying the unwise**. An old question came to me: how do you know, how do you be sure you are dreaming when you are dreaming? Especially when nothing went wrong. (I think this part of thinking might be inspired from the reading on Philosophy of Dreams, and the point is: *you haven't really been there unless you have dreamed about it* - or for that matter unless you have actually went there physically or played in VR. The situation of questioning the reality *@never played an role** in my waking life, but this time during the dream I questioned it, and when I first contemplate that, I felt unsure how to solve it. The determining factor might be: you gotta to have the doubt that your reality might not be entirely real at first place.)

**It's unlike any other dreams - or lucid dreams for that matter**. I seem to know what I was doing, or I was there, vividly and clearly there and speculating about my own situation. ... 

I had an urge to do something not possible in regular situation, and I thought about jumping out of the window like what I did last time (last time I jumped out of the balcony). (the one other piece exact thought was lost). But that's not exactly what I wanted. I wanted to challenge myself - about the height, and do it without supoort!

I've been thinking and appreciating her role in this dream/expedition, missing her a bit, I will probably message her when I go back....

Finally I get the courage - not without doubt and suspicion, and went with one leg over the window (the window has two doors, much like my own balcony door, one is glass, the other is 纱窗). And while doing that I suddenly remembered I could have checked using **bite finger** trick. I tried three times until in the last time I bite so hard it actually made my finger feel uncomfortable (might be more emotionally than "physically" because I was biting so deep it's very weird). And I feel much more certain - and realizing this was **nothing like my previous lucid dreams** (more to come). For one thing, I never had that initial or sudden realization "I am actually in a dream", and before and after this action the vividness of consciousness doesn't have sudden change. 

Now a note regarding how this dream is special (and very unfortunately I can't remember all the visual details nor can I possibly record them after waking up while trying to be a bit healthier to my eyes and morning awaking body): both long before and well after I decided to climb over the window until I wake up, the dream had been so realistic, so **normal**, so **unaffected**, that not just visually, but behavior-wise speaking nothing seemed weird. (And I won't go into detail why this is worth discussing or remembering to talking about, or why it is worth being considered special) 

So I climbed out of the window, now ascertained, but still feeling unbelievable about what is in front of my eyes (as mentioned below, memory about distant objects are unfortunately lost; (Dream study) my memory about my own impression always seemed to last longer and easier to recall - but as one philosopher pointed out, could all those impressions be fake because I couldn't pull up evidences? Or even if I can pull up evidences they can still be "fake" in a sense it's recalled/created in retrospect, not at a previous time - I clearly don't buy his words) - it's literally like looking outside my own window (now when I think about it - it's not exactly like "looking outside my own window" because that sight and location wasn't anywhere real I have been to!)  The grounds, the kids downstairs, the vegetation, they all seemed so natural. 


... (For time reason, skip stories about see various people in each floor while climbing down, especially noticing the pattern of floor utilization every other floor: and in particular in around the 3rd floor below a girl doing her exam was looking at me, clearly bewildered and at the same time not knowing how to complete her exam paper. Also skip the interaction with school kids and Yu Hanwen later while I went down and trying to decide which way to walk on - which edge of the two walls)

There was disgusting deep-green paint-like watery and curling plant like thing sticky on top corner of my desks and I had to clean them up using large amount of kitchen tissue. And talk to many other people saying it's disgusting. Mom at side saying it's called "Impergiun" (pronounce: in-pe-gin) , and it told her during lunch. I was about to argue it's not lunch yet. But well she's psychic and what can I say.

I can still be there and think and talk about it in more detail but I really feel I should come back, especially since this name won't be easy to memorize.

The last glimpse I had over the room was empty white with usually 石膏 bumpy roof as in my North York residence.

Remark:

1. Memory eclipses fast (like time pass by) and I am recording this from back to start.
2. Of course this dream will improve my closeness to her.

---

Room Layout:

Square living room, right is window; left is door. There is a room (washroom) near the door. There is a room behind. Outside the window the room located in top floors of the bullding. Two floors below there is a 10cm-20cm think wall much like the ones I often see in primary school or back in the village. The wall connects this building to another one covering a small area of garden. Outside the wall further to the "right" (as mentioned above) was a large ground of regular buildings .... (Details lost)






Some people among us are ghosts. They are only be visible for 8 hours, then their human world time is up, and they cannot be seen. Some ghosts enjoy not being seen - that means they can do anything they want for they can still interact and stay in this world. Others are sad about it, because that makes them distant from things and people they love. Some go to where they belong - the underworld.

Underworld is not much different from our world. Some places of underworld have more severe weather and soil, others are just like ours - green lands, hills, mountains, trees, lakes, sky. Even plants and some animals grow and live in the underworld. The only issue is, underworld is lonely, and that loneliness is not caused because of not knowing each other's name, but because of power. Everyone upon entry of underworld will gain a superior power - a power than can either change, create, or destroy. No punishment is more cruel than giving someone a deadly power and set them free. There is no government nor rule down there, all you have to worry about is yourself, your own feelings, your own pleasure. When a person enters the underworld, she no longer feels hungry, her body doesn't need food, nor does it need any other mundane maintenance. The animals and plants in underworld are not edible. Life is boring. The only meaningful thing to do seems fighting, or being killed. Killing gives a momentary sense of strong pleasure, every single nerve of body gets excited and one's senses become clearer rather than the usual dull feeling when living there. Being killed and almost-instant reborn - or maybe many years have past, you won't know - at somewhere else, with some completely new power, is a way to start over. Very few people seem to stay long before being killed or killing themselves. You can't really have friends, you can't even look into people's eyes.

It was a lonely place. Every time you reborn, you forget a bit about past. Given long enough, you forget about yourself, your purpose, your life, and why you are here. You become a monster like everyone else, not caring anything about the world, driven by the hunger of power, abusing and acquiring new senses. Some even can no longer speak. Maybe I am just a weirdo, I like to go back to my world, see my family, even though they cannot see me nor talk to me. It took a while to let then know it was me, but afterwards they seemed to accept it well. We reached a consensus to always come back at the beginning of each month, and I would just stay in my room. Mom always kept the room clean. She removed the bed, and put a large table in the center of the room. It always had many fruits and various contemporary objects. I couldn't ear or talk, but I was always glad to hear her talking about life with father, things going on in the world, for 8 hours straight, except for the lunch. Later it became of a ceremony, she would dress up, do special arrangement of the room, and ask father to come and say a few words sometimes. Sometimes I wanted to cry, but all I could do is to hug her. She must have felt something, her body shocked when I touch her. "Warm" she said.

When sister came to the underworld, I found her and persuaded her not to use her power. Then we would go back to human world together. We are the shadow of our family, but that's fine, at least it's something enjoyable, at least they still remember us and they are always welcoming.






（Game idea) Non biased, single-map customized (inspired by Fortnite), online 100 players session (automatic regional matching by proximity and login time and per previous session to get friends in the same city), Played with Ray last time, the map has at its lower left corner a north and south base as initial exploration point. South base features a woman NPC talking and selling 3 kinds of basic weapons including a free heavily custom made AK47 with MP4 like 放大镜, a little to the right to that region is a waste region with various materials. The game is called "Wasteland" or something like that, and zombies starts to act at night. The game has no rule and is just about surviving, killing, crafting, and spontaneous strategy and organization. "Let's play together together as a technical group and survive for a few days" the game begins at somewhere near lower left corner. We shall combine this part of map idea with a dream long time ago similar concept open map boundary and there is a fraction somewhere center of the map a lot of dead trees and it's a plain. The map should be around 1-10 km in size and is photorealistic and feature rich (with little dynamics e.g. weather and map-wise animation). No mobile vehicles or player customization, it's just a hardcore open free RPG like explorable FPS shooter. Developed with UE4 and C++. Game session is persistent per region (configured through console, player can switch session), each session is hosted by one server and refreshed non-periodically when it's no longer playable but it should never happen because resources are closed (except ammos) and can be recycled. There are 3 commands: info, new and join. Players can only talk and it's hearable only to people nearby. If player dies the bodies pile up for a while (handled by server). All assets handmade so the game can be open source.

2rd, 3rd day, it's easy to live with a shelter. My building in 16 is still there. It's just father left it really sorry. A lot of food is still in the fridge however there are plenty on the ground. (Didn't realize it was a dream). I start to feel surprised (delightly) when I see Warren talking with a man on my Balcony when i was planning to go to bed and while I was putting some food into fridge. And saw to my surprise balcony window is higher and other people's balcony is actually below my window. "Hey Warren - you are Warren right?" "Yes?" "I know you from another world" "well I won't be so sure here" "you are probably right". It's a different world, brutal, though he still wear those cool colored glasses, and smile like he do, he might become cruel by the world. Still it's good to not be alone here. Probably because i was named while talking to him. Talking about naked, I see an old man taking bath in a plastic the in building 18 in the twilight. Well it's a different world, and maybe it's not so rude in this bad time without all the cleaning. (When I played downstairs there was only a very smelly and disgusting plastic bag for sleeping)
Then when I go back front the balcony and (start to feel imptrssed) saw a dressed man taking a large piece of washer like black device across my room from door to Washroom entering a closet like back door to another room."Hey now is this how it works?!" I thought I locked. He didn't reply. I was in wonder seeing he put some left over clothes into proper place and the floor of the room transformed (it feels exactly like a 80s science fiction of modern house in my eyes!). I wondered whether it's polite to go and keep it.... (Other details are vivid but it's 5:35 in the morning so no more recording).

**Remark**

* Impression: Wasted factory, trench.
* See WasteLand game project (on Git).






Don't want to spend time recalling, nor can we possibly remake this scene (either using drawing or 3D), but it's gorgeous.

I was making a small 2D animation; Escape from village using secret tunnel; Fellow escapers killed; chasing robot alternate reality; whole city shutdown; warrior emerging pouring over streets. Fast pace background rhythmic music. Heavily stylized movieish characters.

"Whole city 'Microsoft Server Shutdown' message, and gigantic hovering land drop."

"9,9,9,9,9," reporting rebooting message.

To fight, or nowhere to escape. Higher power.

From Universal diary:

```
#Redream #Remark #CreativeProcessRemark #Problem 
If there are two things I care: project nine and my dreams, then I won't be able to capture them speedily, when inspiration comes. (See lost dream journal 20100817)
Both my 2D and 3D skills are not mature and efficient enough yet.
Sometimes we may have a hard time to recall or visualize, but other times, during particular mental states, I don't know how to keep those impressions.
```

But we shall recognize - those recognitions, those information, those identified problems, they are not knowledge. It's just fun and immersive. We need to dig deeper and turn it into "real value".

Dwell in personal creation or imagination and dreams alike are very dangerous - because it's a passive world, it develops fast without boundary of real world limitations, and it's only accessible by you. (Like personal gaming experience) They are not "real value" because it's not beneficial and enjoyable to others - at a least in its raw form. One must turn those personal experience into appreciable contents for others, to make those things less perishable.






9PM last night 2:30 get up work 5:50 back to sleep. Wake up several times quick short dreams, some are interesting e.g. "never realized my neighbours balcony has such curioslt out of proportion high hang roof and cute plants.

The main point:


Dropping, Ahhhhjjhhhhjjh MC-Like blocks, "hey you can't just to thjs there is no passes, block away. 
- Gaming and interaction with my own mind
What would we get if turn around and try to be realistic and get real...
This is library, let there be come people (talking and waking). I know this is not "out of body" per se, but what would he (Qin) think if I am so close. (Not excitement) In dreams our sense are indeed a bit magnified and thus "natural" like when we were young - in reality I would probably bother less.  (Feel very much like interaction in 恍惚状态)
What is outside where is door
Losing senses...
Firs time maybe let's spending too long.

When waking up losing quick

Key points:

1. Gradually improve then obtained details

-- Chinese

就是我通过逐渐不断切换场景。最后到达了一个图书馆。

昨晚睡得早，我猜早上会梦多，机会比较大。

今早好几个梦之后，有一个梦之后我不太记得干嘛，然后就跟自己的潜意识“玩游戏”，从家里阳台上跳下去，让它生成场景，我就不断往下下落，越来越快。

一开始都是些大方块，很Minecraft游戏那种风格。

后来最后有一次它生成的场景没有缝隙可以继续往下落，我就心想这样可不行，然后想了下能不能生成个现实中的场景。

我觉得差不多了。

技术细节真的挺多，很多小的操作步骤。


然后撞向地面之后我转身看天空，再转回来落到图书馆。验证视觉和触觉，稳固感觉。






登山还是什么的，遇到一对母女，约好了次日同样时间比较

李奕遥攀岩，山顶平地（跑酷一般），建筑屋顶，室外，镜壁，室内按照LED指示一截一截攀爬、按按钮。经过一个人/终结一个人，看到但是不能够如何因为我们仍然hold在看起来很薄很薄但是其实很容易hold住的墙壁上。文字画押签字。IT男、不戴眼镜、自幼家中约束怪异一般。我猜想他（李）并没有填真正的名字。我填了Charles Zhang，虽然签字笔有点怪最后一笔歪了。金色名字、世界保护、这该是他无比忙碌的生活的duty。

世界的规则：。。。（Lost）

女主人。

（这一段有些别的细节，不太在意所以没怎么记录）画面中枪爆头一个正往镜头走来长相一般皮肤略黑的女孩。接着后面跟上的两个女孩子，一略胖一略瘦，以及一些其他人。俩人前者扎着某squad感觉麻花辫一种wildness、持半自动步枪，后者某种短小冲锋枪。对着镜头扫射自拍（一些滤镜感的画面），一种狂热表现淋漓尽致。一个特别漂亮的女孩子，穿着吊带一般的红色衣服、围绕的袋子在胸前有好看的交叉空隙。帮助拍照、似乎是好朋友。
没一下前者查看（私密？）上传结构就发现就传到网上。舆论。解释说？？？。她（摄影者）似乎是那个之前（尚未记录）的男生、化身为女、伺机报复。（这段之后的情节、回到我的观察者角度和这实践之外的场景，其实挺重要但是不记得衔续）

”你当时是什么身份？“（灵感来源哈利波特第五部哈利梦醒Wilsley被袭击那段问题？）我当时在一旁、自己不在其中。。。。

跟另一个人（谁？）一起发现身边的环境很奇怪，都是些不认得、看起来很丑陋和不正常的人。“是不是发型被剃（成上面秃）了”。。。原来他们一直生活在这儿。。。看到了之前那个男生和他的家人（母亲）？。。。对话。。。想要离开这个（梦？）世界。。。

所有这儿的人似乎该是都是被她雇佣的生活在两界之间的了。工作结束之后他们就回到这儿，生活在与两界隔离的地方。每个人的脸都无比的丑陋、多少有些扭曲变形（启发自Rick and Morty 第二集？），相比之下那个宅男一般迟钝寡言的白净男孩👦实在是不属于这里一般异常“正常”的了（她自己的儿子？）
他的“母亲”（猜想）给他打点整理安置了衬衫和bowtie。

Salman一脸严肃。7岁时已经进入过梦的世界。始终暗中。。。

“一个测试”。。。My other world link page.

。。。。

。。。。？。。。斩龙。。。人们观看，对龙的行为和讨好。。。

一Circular room，warm laser，梦境环境低重力飞行。

离开那个世界空气变得正常，在空中跳跃翻转不行，但还勉强翻了个跟头。

醒来Jerry在身边，忆梦一会子，依稀觉得壮丽。他跟我遇到了同样的梦，说好了要一起互相补上笔记。他去洗手间我说我先把我记得的2/3记录了。

--

* 梦中觉得很合理的情节，记录下来其实有些absurd，连贯性可见的误缺；
* 世界特异性、（梦呓）梦与现实规则？——这一部分醒来根本已经捕捉不到
* 其实刚醒来还有印象，犹豫、recall、不知是否记录来着
* If care too much will "lost in (recalling) dreams" and make real life less casual and appear occupied.
* 尤其是接近尾声时，其实有许多人名，lost。






被通缉，逃脱在东南亚。

寄宿在一家人。

坐船。车。

墨西哥低调。

回到美国，有接应。






That was an exausting dream. Not physically, but mentally. Colleagues, parent, campus, iskra, and Jerry. 

It's my last day at the campus, (company) so  there really isn't much to do, I was planning to leave early as  soon as I realized my personal data has already een wiped out and my account no longer has any access to company services.
In the end, Jerry slipped out of the exam room and asked me "那个我们上次村那个东西的文件夹，就是什么。。。来的；我怎么也先鼓起来了“。I know it's a question related to the exam, but judging from his ambiguous questions even mme, who is afterall behind all those exam, couldn't answer immediately. I woke up.

The last day on the company campus is the day of departure and the day for Warren to pick substitutes. An exam room has been setup on the side building neart he lake where they will select the ones who know the most of the project.  I arrived at the campus early in the morning, just to realize my accout has already beeen deactivated from most of the company programs. I devided to say goodbye to people around me and just leave cooly. At that time I was sitting in the corner area, the tables immediately near me sits, roughtly 8 people or so, and there are: Ali, .... and the last person, I regretly thought, we could have get to know each other better, she's so nice as I rememberd from our high school: 李萍。

I went outside for some fresh air, passing through all those people hurry to the exam room. Near the end of the hall, Warren caught me and ask me to audit/监考 the exam for some itme while he's busy with something else before coming to audit it himself. He asked me to tell everyone the exxam ends at 9:20 (or 9:40). I went into the room, feeling special when all my peers are sitting in the exam while I am the one to walk freely. Everyone was talking and chatting animatedly while I entered, I shouted "Please get prepared for the exam" but the room was large and not many people heard me. I didn't try again but walked directly toward blackboard. That was a very special blackboard, it seemed old and greasy/smooth after too many use, some areas of the servace look patched. There are a large numberr of equations or something like that on the blackbboard, and since this room was used by another class I hesitated wipe them out. In the end I decided to write the time near the relatively clean corner of the balckboard. The classrom went quiet at that time, everyone was watching me write down the time. I wrote: "Exam Ends 9:20. Pelase Start Now." and I hear people start flipping their exam paper and writing. It was an exam about a project I made, to find someone most capable of taking it over.

I went outside for some fresh air, just near the exam center there was a desktop computer under shadow of a big tree. I sat there doing some browsing. I hear some girl talking in the near distance. It was Iskra, for around 30 minutes, she talked ,I listened, feeling at the same time sometihng stuck on  my throad couldn't breath easily. She was deeply engaged in her conversation and I have never seen her so happy in my life. Clearly she didn't notice my presence, so I kept my back to her. In the end she was tired standing and see there was a chair close and she leaned on the chair. We were so close, like we haven't been for such a long time, I can bet she's right behind my back. She talked about: “我跟你说哦，那个大三的新生。。。。学恶习机器人。。。考试。。。我的成绩不行啦。。。” That must have been her boyfriend. She was talking about her expeirence lately and mentioned someone from a lower grade, the exams, the preparation, recent life, among many many other things. I might have been secretly recitign some of her words, but I have forgotten. It had been long enough that I felt uncomfortalbe with my chair, and I withfraw it a bit. She felt someone was there, and "Uh"ed, and just left. Oh I was approaching her and found my seat gradually behind her back. 

(Eating with parents and Jerry Wu and Nathan etc. and roar with parents, exuastive shouting, and complaining heavity to Anna and Ken about their misdoing; Shanwen asked how he might pursuade them into correcting ehaviors, but I thought of their stuborness and praies for the buddha and hopeless to chance who they already are. There was a wedding show near weilight/dawn, and some people setup booths for showcasing various 婚纱 design for a variety of cultures on the lands scatteredd around water. Anna wasn't super interesed, but I thought Cheryl might take this as a good chance for photogrpahy. ) I won't record all the minute details I could remember about that conversation/argument. But we were having meal together, with my parents and collegues, clearly they have been visting here from China. For some reason I mentioned or they mentioned some future plan for me, and I felt enough of their controlling of me. I told Shanwen that my mother was like a control freak, but instead of controlling her husband, which she deeply conforms and wouldn't say a word (notice this is not true from reality), she controls me. I also told my parents they are horrible people, not just poor, but they dragged me into misery by giving me birth at first place. here was a lot of mean words like those, and I totally didn't care how they felt, how much happy they would have been seeing me again after suc ha long time and finally get a chance to teach me how to properly behave my self - I am just so tired and so sick of them they are revolting to me. After I calmed down and we break apart, I thought about it, and I felt my resentment towards my parent, though originally I was planning to tell Shanwen it's partly because their ignorance to me and partly bevause of my  bad romantic experience during junior high (now thinking about it, I think it's less about romance, but more about the overall education there), it occured to me it might simply because of the childhood constant arguments between my parents that make me sick of them. I would have loved them, bu tht people I loved are dead.






Remark:

This must be the most sophisticated dream I ever had. I don't believe it. It's so vast. I won't be able to record it all.

At first there were 6 seemingly isolated dreams watching from an angle like a surveillance camera. Those dreams are told to be connected. They tell a story about a murder and survival. In one of the scene there was a woman like a doctor (academic) and an old man (like her father?) Locked in a underground room (much like underground room in a Chinese community, well 地下室) trying to breaking out, it was really dim and it has a slightly sick greenish atmosphere 

Then there was me and someone walking together trying to find something. We went far out of the town (the town itself is simple with only a few tall sandy buildings on the side) and into near end of the broad road where there is construction work going on, (Epic) at least 4 or 5 massive machines are at work, the shortest of them is 90 feet tall (10 floors height). One of them has a large circular purple structure, they others also have very special and stunning structures. I only remember trying to squint my eyes and capture some of those details - somehow I thought, to my own surprise, that after that 6 dreams, this is still a dream, and we will need those informatikn for good. Even though I might forget after I truly wake up - it is surprising how at that dream I can think very very clearly and understand my circumstance well, including that I could judge there and I will forget when I get up. I tried to remember the material and texture of those constructions. But I only faintly remember it's a mixture between either metal or ceramic with something else.

Then there was the tour. Grand mountain, lots of trouists. On the side of the mountain where there is a vast plain area under the water fall (?) There was a show.

Then there was me sitting on a train which was used as top row of seats for a live stage when it went broken and they have to fire the train. Liu was in one of the seat compartments. We gently chatted.

Then there's was anothet tour, related, like a previous murder but a replica of a dream. Inside a building, I remember on one of the floors at the corner of the building there is a place for incents (焚香?) . And that was part of the (7th dream?) Murder scene I had - the key at this point is that the memory of all previous dreams are still mixed together, either because it's part of the dream itself, or its because I was trying to keep the memory of previous dreams in my mind.

Then it was my mom. We lived in a very  very family, I lived a very very wealthy and successful life. There was a cause, and I inherited the house from a previous guy - there was one very specific moment st my childhood for this but I don't remember. And one day I left the building with mom at night. My uncle lved with us. .... While we were eating/talking, she finally asked, commandingly, " I need a debit card". It sounded hard. I hesitated, then I replied "sure, you are my mom, you can have my everything". Then she required again, "I also wish you to get rid your sister."

Remark:

* Very intense and strategic conversation with detailed facial clues;
* Very reasonable and realistic scene setup.

Idea:

* It might be beneficial, that instead of attempting to render any, we try to simply my best to record, and hand draw sketches (B/W, mostly focusing on structure and maybe texture), maybe with the help of 3D setup. **For each dream, make it complete**.
* A series of manga/comic can help better convey the story of the dream in this case.
* They all must happen within 5 hours to make it controllable and beneficial as practice. So we can schedule it.






A wonderfully beautiful and sweet dreams where she and I get engaged after a (slightly gaming/strategical- 博弈) competition with 3 other male old schoolmates.

She's just like the way I remembered her, this time a bit triumphantly shy.

Remark: Have been dreaming about her a second time recently. Maybe triumphantly is not a healthy good promise - in reality she would be want to proudly tell everyone. Interaction with quite a few people in the family, lots of conversation. It was nervous before I know her choice/answer, but it was really pleasant to feel settled, with her.

Remark: The problem with (reasonably) negotiated marriage, rather than emotional/impulsive affections? A promise "I will marry you" rather than "I want to marry you"? Maybe in that case she still wants, it's just a bit shy while all the other classmates who like her are around? Visit a problem if she care a bit about their feelings while is also secretly triumphant as I am? Last time she's all over me (without sex) while talking and quite involved.

We were at my gtandparents-in-law's place, it's a large countryside house with spacious space and trees etc. outside it. It's also like her old house in the community, her parents might be nearby. 2 or 3 other schoolmates were staying together Rover night while waiting for her final decision, which she will tel my mom and several other things will be settled. She,. (that boy she used to play with a Lt at primary), me were sleeping on the same bed last night. She's next to me on the left of the bed. We talked s bit during the night. In the morning mom asked people something about recent deposits. I saw mom showing off her we can afford her insurance so now she can truly feel safe. At that time I know her choice.
I went to the washroom and see 二姐 getting up brushing teeth and with hair washed and 扎在毛巾里.

Before all of those three seemed to be an argument between me and 堂姐 about some pphusics problem.

Remark: I wouldn't say I "love" her - I like and admire her but I may not even say I "fancy" her that much these days. However that moment of settlement is so calming and pleasant that it no longer matter how I call my feeling for her - especially when remiinding m yself I just had a hard time thinking about/missing Iskra last night, or worrying about Homeless people on such a thunderstorm njght while j could take a warm shower and sleep comfortably, not even worrying much about homework after a days hard work. It was when we were young - but do recall, even at that an age, we (as human) judge a lot, by appearance - and that's probably she never really liked me much. Those who liked you found you pleasant to look at no mafter what.






* Monsters and ghosts.
* (A scope of definition) Remark on below scenes and how they actually belong to "the other world" rather than real world or a fantasy world or just ordinary dream world. First it's about people/creatures not just my own special experience like in lucid dream, second the world is largely a imagined one rather than a fantasy or real one (e..g in below we have worlds that seemly made from plastic and newspaper floating in the air), and behaviors of the people in those world don't follow ordinary patterns (I.e. they are slightly distinctly odd) - however the deciding criteria is this: even though their rationale are unfamiliar, it's distinct and appreciable. Beings of different ways to live their own colourful daily life, that's the Other World, like Spirited Away, not an underworld where people suffer or fantasy world where there is some underlying politics/organization etc  It's also because those worlds are entered from real world and exit to real world and they are scattered around, rather than necessarily geologically connected.

Grandma, village, old family. Carriage, cousin （堂姐), night trip. Slept with a large dog. Talk about monkey king.

When I wake up in the morning, my hand knocked the dog still in the mattress, and it tried to gently bite my hand, and I woke it up, and it went into the hallway. Then after a while a servant looking woman came down and seems to start preparing breakfast for me? (Though I didn't see that part), at that time I asked where is the washroom. 

(Special scene - the family tower) Old familily is very very rich, two families live together, one rent ours, both for the equal debt. It's a circular castle, marvel/绿宝石 made. Washroom is on the 9th floor.
Two major toilets I see in the whatever floor, one has large transparent door (partly wooden) and clean toilet. The other is on the other side of the hall and it's completely enclosed with worden door. In between them inside the room was the shower/bath area where a small bath pool resides along with some other facilities I don't remember.

Flower 仙子 travel ground. Bad guy breaking stuff (trying to stop then arriving home. Explode bad guys stuff. Escape and hide under the ground. Very small world.  Floating world on the infinite sky. Plastic/paper made.

Drive (younger) sister home (later character identify changed to a generic one). Back home stranger noise, observed masturbation like bahvior. Argument (another boy, much like someone she's affected, me as observer point of view). Demonstrate the video, monstrance, no worry. There are roommates. Send back home. No way. Phone call,  wrong numbers, different service orovider. Called twice, can understand only "press 1" part, the rest unknown language. Downhill,  Fire fighters. Trade-off, leave her and guard in term. Pillow flight (not pillow fight), sword fight. Guide character. 

(Special scene - The downhill firefighter village.) I wanted to find a way out/back. (Now it reminds me, maybe at the very beginning when I was trying to send her back, we were following someone, then there was a delay caused by her catching up something, and the group has left out of sight, and we are lost how to go back) I found it easier to fly while sitting in a pillow (external power of the medium?) than entirely on my own.

(Special scene - the water village) (Important) Pass the exit I see myself standing on a platform above water, immediately ahead are many regions of flat ground where buildings atop. Those restaurant and entertainment buildings have distinct modern taste including 

Horror Movie: The Hole (at school bathroom bathtub) 

Remark: (On memory recall) Once in the night I woke up and reviewed some scenes (I remember it was 2) from a previous dream, at that time the two scenes was quick clear even though not entirely vivid. Now it's forgotten.

**Remark**: I was thinking about making those manga but I don't remember all the structural serials (I.e. the inspiration about what to tell and show). E.g. the village's layouts even though I was flying over it observing for a while. The other thing was the family tower which I was playing for a while on the first floor then somehow magically arrives in a higher floor.  The goal is authenticity, so there is no need to make up, so it's efficient. As a side effect of the grand scheme, not intentional design.

**Remark**: the lingering feeling decays very quickly the longer we are awake and that caused some difficulty not just in the recalling of detials, but also the **willingness** to make a record.

Problem Identification: Scenery details. As I mentioned in The Grand Scheme, memorizing those nontrivial first time details requires really the ability to memorize even the trivial looking (which are actually nontrivial but just because we are too familiar with them) serials in daily life, for instance:.

1. Detailed design I'd each subway station when we pass
2. Dressing of individuals as we see in the buss
3. Room layout of university buildings
4. Speeches of each person (exact original words possibly with distinct tone and sound)
5. Dynamic flow of people, of crowd, of cars and weather
6. Facial recognition (we are weak at this) and name recognition (we are weaker at this)
7. Travel and explore new places and consciously make a (mental) note of new features, remember the path and how we get to those places (e.g. Hart House layout, Tobomory travel route).







Tiffany had this weird symptom that every month at 24th she's very weak and will randomly fall down (lose conscious for a few minutes). I caught her just in time, though not fully, using my arms while noticing she was falling while going out with us. She said this also comes at the same time sometimes with her periods, which make the situation harder for her. Poor girl.

We were traveling into a circus like amusement park's haunted house. Three actors dressed like 黑白无常 came in and said the performance won't be much fun without them.

It was mild intro to the history of horror, and I want moaning like I can't help because I am feeling such a strange pain/discomfort on my lower leg. I suppose they injected some medicine for this effect. Hopefully it doesn't last long.






We accidentally get trapped into some inside the building and realized it would be a bug - the doors and basements windows are quickly getting sealed. There was a large hole on the ground, a girl was before is and went inside. We were secretly following, afraid she might be fine theirs. She heard is, and she pointed out there was even a boy before him. We went in together (4 of us). It's like a deserted construction place, end of it a large garage or production/logistics center much like Home Depot or Ikea thou gh cleaner.

A think voiced tall man accepted us and gave us a brief tour around as if this is nothing surprising. He obviously takes care of those wonders around and send them back safely.

Their weapons are not like electrically charged particles or glowing water bombs or symmetrical machine gun. 

I wish I could take a photos of those vehicles on the street, the scene is so real, it doesn't even look like what I am used to from svi fi - no shinny and super slick designs, but plain good cars that doesn't run on wheels. Phone camera doesn't work, it either sees nothing, or ordinary cars.

It's an ordinary building in the community, at the bottom there is a room for commercial area, quite small indeed. One of the door has the edited feature that at a particular time it becomes darker and you can enter it. While I was trying to get out, a girl standing outside waiting for bus saw my head poking out, and she become curious and tried to went it. I managed to stop her with hidden plates 

We are going to meet a respected man who lives by the water.

Mom insists we keep those shrines st home clean..

There are indeed very strong power field, we can clearly sense it while we go close to Buddha, jn fact, everything in the home now seem to vibrate some form of energy, (roughly 5 kinds?), And we had to fall back to my own room.

They have never heard of transistor! I thought it would be cool to give a lecture on it... "Maybe what we have discovered is that a different polarity of the facts, and your technology is developed based on the other polarity!"

Summary - Other World Feature

1. Entrance at real world, deserted and not used by people 
2. Other forms of existence, either being or technology or both
3. Pleasant and harmonic experience

More defence on this style (favorite): Spirited Away.






If we are given the chance to start over again, some people may not want to Ame (make?) the same decision again.

A talk with marrying cousin about opinion on managing marriage.






```
Everyone 100 blood, everyone 0 energy
Every single move can accumulate 0.5 e:energy, other actions can accumulate energy
Mal is just a simple gtie, people start randomly per distribution
At every turn each person orally summarize.
Each person has an upgrade tree, per support/upgrade, e.g. TD (weak at beginning, getting much better latet, e.g. 2 to 3 points)
At the very beginning what each player can do is only to collect energy points and not doing much.
Key: self illustrative, 0 entry, talkative, memory.
Second upgrade chart can be acquired.
Chart contains a tree of energy actions at various energy points consumption e.g. 1.5-5 points. Each action/upgrade can possibly lead to next.
Others don't need to know what upgrades we have (this serve as a random even to othees as well, but we need to chant it)
棋子只是代表位置和人物颜色，距离移动有限制。
The map is purely abstract, with it straight and diagonal lines, maybe jump lines as well. Many people can gather all at the same spot (e.g. for close range attack).
Disks are huge #ij original dream): around 3 cm diameter. Slightly larger than grid size..
Random number sheet: date/seed (31), sequence, entry (Max 2, max 6, max 12 A-Z/number), multiplier/next sequence.
Every full cycle, GM/any player can announce some historical event about the progression/ background of the game world/new event. 
Map is abstract, but represent some events etc, can be downloaded and printed, have many many versions and affect strategy (and even size affect player number). (It's better if we can devise a way players can customize jt; As a "zelr-organjzed"/"0 background" game) Players need to count/memorize current turn, starting at 0.. That's the only "irrelevant" information that all people must memorize, otherwise just memorize its own stats and others stats. Others stats shall be annlunced only once as each player progress  because the information can be strategical 
A map can contain resources at grid points, as in the map /map event spec (two print tables). Whoever is moving three is responsible reading. (A reading game). Notice grid elements at known places are good - just like footnote, this is stratigical. Initial landing locations are known/not known.  Distribution of resources (on map) should be well balanced.
A separate (fantssy/game specific) item sheet/index shall be provided is so desired. E.g. weapon spec. Notice only first time use/discovery needs to announce it. Later it becomes a strategical element. Each game session by design can be quite optimized.
Optional element: each then can contain story or/and turn event pushing progressing of progress. 
The theme we were playing seem like robotic etc. related and supported by major banks as upgrade tree mauvering a wasted city.
Strategy/knowledge/entertainment points: story, memory, battle upgrade, other objectives, talking. Usually random number is not even needed. Called a "table top game scheme".

地铁上遇到一大堆一起出来玩的小学同学，五官一般（不是非常端正），但是很nice。曾伟、等。俩女孩子其中一个很可爱坐另一张桌子聊天，这些男生就知道玩棋。They said if they could have known a month ago some girls would have accompany. Was seriously thinking about asking who is single. In the dream I was so bored by the game and distracted by the girls I almost dozed off.

前传篮球Ray足球混动争吵一人不肯进室内，一人打架皮肤全是血关起来大家都很同情。Party of people following instructions suddenly get wild. Horror drama. It's a dream, people are coming, I need to persuade others go tall.
Flying battle angle with swords that work like bombs.
```

See unlimitedbattle.com for more details.






* Background: IELTS classmates gathering, afterwards I practice fly techniques. 
* New: Here I didn't use classical concentration based simple Superman style flying, but first used some acceleration based inertia based lying down or 后空翻 style flying, which is similar to my usual precious styles. But then I discovered something new: by stepping my foot rapidly in succession, I can push myself froward with strongly perceivable air drag and stepping feeling on my foot. At first the dragging force was very strong and it's hard to maneuver in air. Later after about 30 minutes of practice off main street I was able to be relatively stable and fly like walking gradually in the air, though still have some difficulty raising myself without falling back to classical techniques (details not remembered).
* Theme:. Another theme at the table was see Cherotte talking to William and other girls etc. yet not able to attract their attention. Another theme was me talking too loud in public to myself while on the air.
* Scene: In the end when I was able to move in the air with much less air dragging force I flied/walked over a house (traditional roof style like in Cartoon) where they planeted 6 pod sized small gardens on their roof.
* Observation: In the dream I deeply believed I already know the previous methods (I.e.before practising stepping skill) per previous experience and never doubted a bit that was a dream and not possible in "reality". 
    * Theory: In dreams, like in reality, we have a sort of self-confident/self-consistent memory, as if dream and real world are two semi-interfering but also independently coexist realities, each with its own unique identity.

Symbol: If we ever find ourselves capable of any sort of airborne behaviors without external device, we are certainly in the dream.






A beautiful and romantic love in a past and mix of modernity.

Three Kingdom. Mg last words to her, so.cs we won't come back: I wod have expected a better life for you ... You come back as queen of the ancient world, me writer of the modern ancient....

Ryan played her, said: I was shocked when you said come back every two years..

"No even if two years j won't be able to come back...."

It's beautiful and touching. Let's just let it go and forget the story between us.

Karen in the last minutes wanted to stay on the same car as her so he can confess....

If a man cannot live in a (good) dream, how can he ever feel safe staying in a (situation)/life that seems so good to be true/so good (for him) to  want to withdraw/leave? Where is the boundary between truth and reality? 

Is it true nothing lasts forever, and everything eclipse like a dream?






（之前还有）

新家装修一半，我太累躺在刚装好的台桌上竟睡了过去（*评：不说内容上，这儿小结一下关于梦纪体的个人格式——省略主语、流水账式、事无巨细、按照观察顺序记录、形容词副语一般遵从当时心理；这句话稍微多一点“可读性”其实可以这样说：稍微lame一点可以是”折腾了一点装修新家感觉好累啊！“稍微文学性一点则是压根没必要提，直接说我做了一个梦。*）。梦里看见墙上有好些绿叶状的细腿虫子，好几面墙上都是。我喊爸爸妈妈跟我一起把他们都给除了，可是家里又没有东西。妈妈说用什么呀（*体例：省略引号*），我焦急、看到地上又爬将出来，急着找到源头，又看到一些个工状细细长长蚯蚓一样虫子。也想过珍惜生命，但赶不走的轰不尽的，还是拍死的好（*体例：思考内容省略关于主体的主语部分句子成分、句子简洁明了直接叙述内容——就好比是有限的捕捉空间，我们只记录这一空间内发生的、观察到的，而不在梦纪本身进行语言上的委婉、过度文学修饰——这样一来分享级别的作品则理应重新整理文段、再去叙述成文。*）。就用厨房餐巾纸吧。可是那么大一只虫，万一爬得很快到手上怎么办？不得我拿起餐巾纸去拍虫，一阵开门声我从梦中惊醒（*句式：主副同位语*）。爸爸拎着装修工具一并油桶等上来。我惊魂未定，想起下午粉墙时看到的蟑螂/蚂蚁，赶紧跟爸爸说，我们去买拍子吧。爸爸说好啊，我可以去Osco买（*注：此处Osco虚指，梦中的确用了个商场名词，但是醒来已经不记得，隐约类似发音。*）。我倒是愣了一下，外面天这么黑，爸爸竟然答应出门。Osco是哪里。那里的屏子据说比较好。原来是误以为我在旧家跟Ryan睡客厅没有隔断。不不不，我要买的是拍子，苍蝇拍。就去金宝市场旁边那个Canadian Tire就好了（*注：此处Canadian Tire也是虚指，但是梦中该不是某原生词汇，而确实是某个现实中的商场名称。前面金宝市场似乎是的确这样说。*）。其实我也不知道这个点还有没有开门。刚睡醒还有点困，但是觉得托爸爸一个人去有些过意不去，还是一起的好。

我们出去开在路上，并没有乘街车。中途经过一条两旁树木的新开的路（*注、文法：此处**关于路况等完全不知道如何语言描述准确精炼**、以至于仅仅用”两旁树木“这样笼统的表达。*），尚未行至中途有听到广播声，只听闻：车至中轨，即将进行合并（*注：此处不是当时完整内容，根据记忆补充，相差细节甚远。*）。心念该是两厢并行的街车要合并载客，虽然新奇但也无什么好惊讶的。心里却有些紧张。只感觉一阵压力扑面，心神紊乱，（*注：很明显这儿也有细节丢失。*）自己坐在原地好似未动，却已经换了辆车。驾驶座上不是爸爸，而是一个戴着眼镜沉着的中年人，后座上俩年轻人手舞足蹈的说着等会到达旅行目的地的行程。我一时慌了神，说好的街车合并，怎么把咱们的车也并了。我连忙问眼镜怎么回事，眼镜说合并载客，车跟人选出来密集布置（*注：根据片段记忆重建，并非完整原话。*）。可咋就偏偏把我跟父亲分开了。我不知眼镜要开往何方，更不知父亲现在在哪。到了一个加油休息站一车人停下来，我下了车，想要寻个高处好找人，一眼看到加油站商店一层楼高的屋顶。不知哪来力量，只觉得自己老早熟悉这样，越身跳到加油⛽机上面，再一跃想要跳到相隔4米的屋顶。却是摔了下来。屋里人出来看，我自己也懵了神（*注：根据片段记忆重建。*）。店长为首的是个穿白色厨师围衣的男人（*注：这儿很明显有个场景转换被我丢失了细节。*），他扶我起来一起进去吃东西。入门内一阵咖喱味，我根本没闲情跟他们一起唠嗑（*注：根据片段记忆重建。*），进门时已经掏出手机打了老爸138...（*注：梦中打的是完整的电话号码，这儿隐私原因略过；当时用的好像还是个iPhone手机。*）的电话，结果英文not available提示不在服务区。我没想到身在加拿大，倒是另生疑虑。跟店里面几个伙计彼此介绍了一番（*注：诸多大量对话此处醒来丢失——即没有用力去回忆、也因为相比其他部分情节此处其实记忆不清楚；另外也根据此篇梦纪记录顺序从两头向中间有点关系、到了中间差不多也忘了。*），他们操着一口浓浓的印度风格口语。我问一个精瘦能干的，这是在哪里。他答了句India也不知是indie a（*注：根据片段记忆重建。*）。我心里一阵乱骂（自己的）祖宗，怎么就到了这么个地方来。店里有个皮肤黑黑的、圆脸的女孩子上来问我遇到了什么问题（*注、文法：完全不知道如何去简单精炼和或带有文学气息优美的描写人物、强调速记。另外此处也的确醒来遗忘的差不多。*）。我看到她的样子不禁心里一震，她让我想起一个自己十分爱的人儿。我静下心来，正在寻觅着出路时，麻烦已经找上了门。

（原梦此处细节不清晰，省略关于警察找上门来等细节）。。。

（以及如何我们到的这儿）我知道此刻说的太清楚或许会失去这个朋友，但是如果不说以后或许再也没有机会（*注：这儿的心理想法根据片段记忆重建，当时可能心理活动和动机更为细致些。*）。我很喜欢你这样的女生，她有些惊讶，年纪也不小，我都不知人家是否有了相好的，这样坦白着实莽撞（*评：关于她的年龄和外貌其实可以在上面刚见面的时候多描述细致、如果记得的话。*）。

（*注：背景环境丢失；补：当时似乎我们在一个类似于院子的公共设施附近的花园/草坪附近，然后好像发生了什么event人们要通缉我（和其他的人物？），然后警察把人群疏散开来、现场抽查，当时有一些本地人赦免的聚集圈子在厅内。*）（*注：我当时不是和她单独在这儿出现，而是也有其他人，可能是当时一起餐厅的伙计等；也有除我之外的人被通缉。*）在厅外呆着太过可疑，现在查人我们还是进去本地人区域的好。入口其实没人查（*注、评：入口细节、周边环境细节太少。*）、她给看一眼身份就让我俩都过了（*注：根据记忆片段重建。*）。我跟她一起找了个最里面靠墙角落坐下，花岗岩宽凳（*注、补、文法：完全不知道如何精炼准确的描述这儿的场景；补：说的很啰嗦的话，当时其实是一种类似于石头雕刻的或者石头挖出来然后打磨一个凹进墙壁的位置，板凳的部分其实跟墙壁连成一体，原本打算用“大理石”但是不是黑白的、而是那种我现在已经不记得准确内容但是当时想来的确是根花岗岩纹理颜色接近的一种表面，乍看上去就像是石头里面还有一些细小的棕色石子装饰用、那种一半粗糙、一般光滑的表面；除此之外墙壁两侧掏空、像是窗子一样，这样坐在里面的人虽然面对着墙和一半的门一样的出口，但是有身边和身后两个打开的空洞，我但是不知哪里来了一条白色毛巾，想要遮住自己的头来的，梦中不知道为什么总是遮不了，就挂在胳膊上想要枕在胳膊上我坐在右边靠窗的位置、手臂可以放在窗沿上，靠着装睡。*）。我取来白色的湿巾盖住胳膊佯装自己伴着墙在睡觉。一个穿制服的高个子男生走了过来，她热情地跟他打招呼。男生问话我，我也就不方便装睡。听他说了几句复杂的什么，看着我提“identification”，我问是否要ID（评：读来无趣——他什么表情、怎样身材、着装细节，这些观察细节可以增加新颖有趣细节。）（*注：此处应该也有对话。*）。他点点头。我掏出卡包，刻意右手挡住了印度政府的临时身份卡片（记得在当时卡片上有特定图案、完全语言也能够描述，只是文字中说起来显得闲赘、尚不知道如何在“记录”和“文学性”中获得平衡——以及当然、有限的时间。）（*补、造梦之术：当时自己的the RIDGE金属卡包正常的推开式取卡，从右往左一张张的卡都可以看到，在最右边第二张也是张平时不曾在我卡包中、梦中原生的卡，此处没有记录；另外当时看到的那张**瞬间获得印象**为印度临时通行证的卡有些类似加拿大本地居民ID/美国驾照，在倒数第二三张的位置。造梦之术：其实我不知道这种细节有没有用，所以尚且不明确**记梦时、受到记忆、时间、字数等的客观限制，该捕捉什么样的内容、以达到促成什么样的境界目的？***），在她给他看过自己的后才假装轻松无事的取出自己的加拿大驾照，那人没多看就递给我了，似乎是没认出我来。但是走开不远，我看他按了下挂在肩膀前的传呼机，里面说到什么“chaojian zhang”（*注：当时我该还挺明白他其他一些单词，因为有一个意思是“搜索一下这个人”。*），恐怕是要查我身份。果不其然，没一下子整片区域禁严了，保安出来把人们轰走，只要我出去。我不想拖累她，（*注：行为、场合细节丢失。*）拿了两片她带在身边的面包，只身走了出去。（*造梦之术：她叫什么名字？*）（*评：她此时的神态表情？*）

我两手高举着两片面包🍞，走出铁围栏的门（*文法、造梦之术：这儿完全不知道如何准确精炼描述出那一扇门的结构——其实是个非常简单的寻常时候也有见到、但是不同于家家户户的门那种，说成”铁围栏“只是不很准确——就是木门带窗，但是靠近里面的这一侧窗边有铁围栏罩住。*），一边还想咬一口缓解压力表现得很轻松。出去后看到深夜的草地上远处隐隐约约站满了全副武装的士兵，不论我一个外地人人生地不熟心里已慌得很，举着步枪各个角度瞄准着我。我生怕造成怀疑，一面大喊"I am going to throw this"一面丢了面包，再大喊"I am going forward"并小步往前走。他们很安静，什么也不说，就看着我的举动。我倒觉得他们可能随时要发作。我顺着他们围出来的道路一直走，直到路的尽头，以为要有人抓我上车押运什么。却不想一头栽进一道看不见的门（细节遗失）。（*注：大量细节丢失；造梦之术：另外当时刚出门的夜晚外面布置的场景、像是某些围在一起的石造建筑——比较传统类型——围出来的后院。*）

眼前一个如中央车站（*注、文法：原本用“Union Station”，但“中央车站”更形象易懂。*）般高阔的大厅、却似在山洞中，一直通到正前方远处。南北两面墙上尽间隔挂着些巨大的屏幕。殿的两端也是。屏幕下面是一个门，门后有车声，想必是通道了（*注、造梦之术：这儿不确定如何描述；当时不是所有屏幕底下都是通道，而有的直接是一些具体功能的布置，例如金属搅拌口、商铺一般。*）。不想我无缘无故被盖了个“不符合互联网世界”的罪行，要被打发到这些无人要的回收世界中去。放眼望去，四周的宣传大屏上分别是：无尽的金属垃圾搅碎中心，印度仿制的汽车动漫电影一般的加油站，汽车配件中心，旧时代的彩色追逐枪战电影，杂货商铺，各色异项选择世界广告，以及一些看起来不入主流的设计粗浅的商业动漫电影。我以为有人来抓我去回收，不过自己走了圈似乎大家都忙着自己找个坑载进去。这儿该是无人要的领域了。我不想就这样被回收到别的世界，兜着圈想要寻个出路，看到一旁岩壁边角有蓝色闪光的穿凿，绕到后面是片冰晶的窟窿，有个小洞里面黑漆漆似乎隐隐闪光，犹豫要不要钻的更深间突然冒出三个头：一瓶洗衣液、一瓶机油、一罐橄榄油对我说，兄弟，你也是要被回收的？我们都不甘心淘汰的命运，不想离开自己的世界。我说我也不知怎么的，就被断定为不符合互联网世界、被人哄了出去，现在想着法子逃走，不知兄弟们有没有主意。。。

地下餐厅看到的人、似乎是听闻了我的故事。说班长那一段完全就很突兀了，不会留意到后来关于她的情节。我只道这些不过我所见所闻如实写出来，事情先后顺序、笔墨分配一般。

我不多理会人们评论，看到餐桌上她静静坐在那儿笑嘻嘻看着我回来。我坐下来对她说些堆在心中已久的话。我觉得。。。我跟她靠得很近了，她吃饭叉子握紧在手上。我可以看到她衣领下露出来的胸脯，跟她的形状很像。干嘛哪。我觉得如果。。。我的头离她很近、就要碰到了一起。我觉得如果你可以的话。。。。我的头跟她的头碰在了一起，我心跳的好快，心中紧张。我要告诉她我对她的感觉。告诉她她可以让我忘了那个人，告诉她我想要和她在一起。她已害羞的低下了头。。。不记得是否闹钟响，但我似从未睡着般清醒。

如果一个人不能够永远活在一场美梦中，那当他身处生活顺境时，还如何能够安逸地享乐、知晓美梦破碎时这一切才会看上去过分的美好？越是不愿割舍的就越是珍惜，越是珍惜的就越是脆弱摇摇欲坠。真实和现实的界限又在哪里？又是否诸事不长，万物须臾消逝如梦？

悲剧如果近看也只是荒唐，我对她不眠不宿的执着终不过愿望难成的幻想。我这场梦来的惊险，去的突然，回忆起来却全然不曾那个滋味——莫怪文笔粗糙，只是当时事物、往昔画面，如何能比当下的现实？只道那会儿梦中的人儿，忘了自己的处境、凭的心动。

Remark: 原梦诸多人物对话不记。

Remark：时间仓促，有感而发才记。往间数梦未记。

Remark：成事在梦，悲喜由人。

Remark：小胡说赶紧毕业正经。

Critic：从故事本身来看，俩人感情因为缺乏过程描述，显得莫名其妙。“诸多人物对话不记”是个不很理想的Compromise。

Remark: This might mark the official beginning of an affection for girls with brown skins, though personality wise it might be harder to filter due to difference in culture.

Remark：这样的文章、好在还算简练些，但即便如此，自己再读都困难——在于语言（内容）太过于平时。到并非是需要修辞、而单单是叙述的内容，虽”提取自梦中“本有些阻碍，但论到平时来看、总显得过于单调——参见括号中关于**文学性**和相关的、**造梦之术**之上的评价。

Remark：这个梦凑巧醒来记忆清晰，所以可以记录下来，直到白天都还印象挺清晰（除去不记得细节）。






Rom办优秀Intern创意大赛，我的话题是让一个baby不哭不闹、用设计来丰富其生活。预算是每个Intern1个月的工资，3h内实现，总共四人。其余细节此处不记。

在梦里面首先用温水抹布清干净他之后想到可以：1）（梦醒时当时已完成），1）用彩纸剪出千纸鹤、飞机、以及什么来给其悬吊装饰（梦醒前在赶着搜集材料、公司图书馆等），2）用硬纸板给塑造个仿真森林艺术环境，3）。。。（细节不记得）






The event lasting legendary battle between men and women has lasted ages and ages, generations over generations fight over their right to dominate the next epoch. This epoch has been dominated by male power. (The pillar of legendary past in the perfect universe, alternation 2 parallel world)...
Each one of us is either an their of his or hers.
My famous and stupidly rich neighbour, on the other hand, is his, and out family is hers. She won last time, but this age has been dominated by his, and they try to battle and eliminate us.
Using power seals I attempt to lock him up in the 鼎/Cabin of ?? Fuwu, and father's (like Rick's) infinitely cloning machine was working until...
Here is how it works: when time comes: 1) enter the process, 2) make your way through and slightly tilt the 天枰 of ??? power. 3) wait for next round.

A car with LED on.






Mom, city travel,war, bombing, collapse.
It's part village, part town. 

Seemingly forgot what happened before below events. But that should be more granular. In general if we could remember - only if we could - the overall scenery of such a countryside town can be quite interesting. But I don't. 

One image was: the roof or the whole building (around 2-3 floors high) collapsed and before that many residents/travellers/villagers like us were trying to protect/escape yet they are running towards the exit of the building. But I saw/knew the basement and instead asked mom to go with me to the basement. The bombing was frightening and the whole house was shaking, pieces of the ceiling starts to fall. We didn't get a chance to grab any food and I wondered if we were stuck how we might get rescued - or will people rescue us at all if we buried so deep. Then it went quiet, I opened the door of the room (the basement has around 3 rooms separated by I divudual walls, the room adjacent to ours has - if I remember correctly but faintly - a grandfather and his grandchild) and the outside ceiling has fallen. It's not possible to navigate through and we have to bend to see anything. Through the many layers of collapsed building we can see the dark sky outside. Seems we are not that deeply buried anyway, though it's still quite some distance. I asked mom to be quiet and we'd better wait until the morning, when the enemies have left. It was tough sleep and morning sunshine woke me up. 

No idea how we got out. But later we somehow met with surviving villagers and we're seeking our way to the train station. It was tough, I can remember vaguely soldiers boarding on the shore and people stop us from leaving the town. But it the end we were squeezing on the train to an adjacent city.

* My feeling for my mom in this episode of dream was quite peaceful.
* Today later was another dream which overridden my memory for this one, which was quite significant, see Journal. That dream was about Iskra and not recorded. Part of the architecture was Incorporated into Project Nine for the library. I only (surprisingly, suddenly) recalled part of this dream as recorded above on my way home from university library that day at 10PM while waiting for the subway and took out the phone to plan next week's study for microelectronics and probability - though those two subjects might be completely irrelevant information.






Lived with parents/grandparents-in-law, wanted to give myself a bit pressure so we can learn to be independent and more efficient everyday. Packed things up with 200 dollars/RMB at hand and plan to leave home one day before night and don't come back never or not until winter break (at that time it was September/October just like current time, I.e. I am in school at Winter Term). Attempted twice, second time told them before I go, and the next morning mom asked Grandma to prepare breakfast early. There was of course a rawl between me and my father - he always seems to stand in the way? (I guess in reality mom is who always seems to stand in the way)

...

It's not a hotel, it's more like a residence that's illegally operating as a hotel/客栈, .... Criminal intention, bad blood, robbery, killing, run out...

Was on the car with father and Mon and maybe my cousin, then we hear the crowd went noise. Looking ahead there was gigantic green spaceships, round and long and flat ones. One round one literally landed on top of our car (it's very small and just as big as a car) and a lady came out, just like us, wearing green.
Then things went a bit wild - people say those are American spaceships disturbing our world (China, though supposedly I was still in Canada because the next morning I have Monday class at UofT) and there is very wild sexual behaviors when she asked "do you want to see ... with man/2P/3P.." then brought out more than a dozen men for live performing.

...

Remark: I just remembered, thought it would be nice to just keep a record; The hotel scene actually deserve more attention, so is the scenery I see after run out of the hotel (not on the bridge with soaceships yet); The scene with spaceships and crowds are also interesting. 

Addition: Heard a song before falling asleep which didn't belong to this world. It was a female's voice and the style is like any other Chinese song before 2010s. Didn't bothered get up and record it, because well anyway **I won't be able to** - unlike texts, conversations, or sceneries, music (recording) is not a skill I have acquired at least the foundations.






记梦

# 极寒天气，破败城市，飞行Tetris小方块状机器人，激发启动对讲，半旧庭院，堆散的设备
# 理发，姐姐，二楼唐人街，烟呛，流利，眼神，久等，可乐吐出来，用餐、假装去洗手间，太黑，下楼，争论，破坏
#* 买单的时候取出卡套结果那个自称不是“老板”的女子给我看了一旁跟我的卡一模一样的一整套信用卡等，说之前两次理发（那个理发师前后给我叨了两次，中间给了我半杯可乐自己凉着）中途有半个小时把我迷倒、盗制了这些卡片，并且这里面有证明我违背了？？？（不记得）；我（半下意识的）抽出其中的卡片翻看背面字迹模糊、然后全部撒开在她面前指着鼻子问这些如此模糊的怎么能够指控我，她一张张看果然如此

Remark

# 时间关系，早晨8点去上班，另外第一个梦其实是夜里醒来过，当时未能够Recall
# 俩梦这样关键词描写丝毫不及其中场景布置和经历细节万分之一，但是我们至少可以做的
# 之前不知是否议论过，单纯记录流水细节的话，其实对于后来的启发也微渺，除非真的做到详尽、完整，参考资料般可供日后使用，但那会花许多时间

启发

# 






体育前半段不记得，后半段是类似于蹴鞠但是用树枝、球棒等来实现、不肢体接触但是可以拼打一下的。校园里面就着操场和建筑附近被围成赛道（类似于赛车那种紧凑）、地面全是草坪。有一种口字形类似于soccer的得分架、都是守护的队伍自己装的。

她是个脸圆圆的小女孩，不会显得特别生灵活泼，但也是个很好看的女生（how is this possible？）。不属于可爱类型，但看起来可人。体育老师几番邀请一起，她拽着我的衣袖一起回班级、体育老师邀请去办公室坐坐，就安慰她去那儿一下给点面子，老师不知什么意图。

我的手冰冷，她的时候特别暖和，轻柔的搓着取暖。

细节不记。这儿主要的特点，是梦生的''非affection、非emotion、但却固有的connection''。






创建时间：2014-08-01 15:26

3：27  在我跟你约会之前，不许喜欢其他的女生。
无理，但总算是个肯定的答复了。

易璐在这个暑假（梦纪的话用“假期”，避免混淆）告诉我喜欢来着。
黄氏找易璐打视频电话给我，她此时独自在家中，家人未归，桌子上热气腾腾的火锅。
看着你的脸，听着你的声音，是激动，是犹豫。
暑假尝试着approach you好多次，都是不冷不热的答复。
黄氏，这样想念你好累，我不想喜欢你了。（”我不想再想念你了，喜欢你好累“？）
你犹豫了一下，没有直接拒绝，低着头淡淡的说，
在我同意跟你约会之前，不许喜欢其他的女生。
我微微一笑。
（睡前刚想着做梦要有些意义。
想想了一篇 幻现，在梦的结尾说醒来后想念你流泪。窗外仍是黑夜，我不会放手。）






创建时间：2015-01-26 00:42:06
修改时间：2015-01-26 00:42:34

要求Photorealism的渲染。让故事看起来就像是拍照出来的。












* 在每晚长约90min的睡眠周期中，人会有约10-45min的时间在做梦。不过大部分人睡醒就忘了
* 夜里醒来的时候记录下来一些关键字、一些录音可以很有效的帮助次日早晨回忆
* 夜里醒来用笔纸、电脑或者录音记录完整的梦境的话若是超过5min就可能不易重新入睡了
* Stress Brain对于回忆梦境不必要 






1. We will still use Tiddly but mostly will transfer to Desktop only for self-contained dream notes. However for mapping purpose we will use dedicated graphs in Canvas.
2. (Objective) Canvas is intended to be our highly customized and lightweight functional **text note** AND **graphical draft** AND **concept management** program, in terms of: 1) It will provide note editing with tag and comment fields, it will not bother native MD preview and searching and everything but will provide native SQLite exportation solution, each item is allowed to have an allowed to be non-unique "Name" (I.e. Title) property mostly for quick identifying purpose (like a boom title), 2) It will provide geological information to notes in terms of 2D location and size, and optional z domain (for height or other universe identity), it will serve as a graphical composition program in contrast to raw graphical editor meaning it can import and compose geographical entities and allow exporting and reimporting (likely it can remember last asset path), notice image is a native property of note (besides its text content) and if it doesn't have a image payload already, it can be stylized by a set of document level style sheets **based on tags** and **document level imported graphic entities**, 3) the concept management aspect is mainly realized as an editor interface providing tooling rather than all-in-one native editing (much like UE4), it's key feature  and purpose and function is to allow us **manage Items (arbitrary concept entities) with metadata** (in a sense, we can see this as a purification of Somewhere's Knowledge system with format-generic content and intentionally ignored title), every item shall have document specific conventional YAML field available for future query purpose (e.g. "find all items with a YAML field named 'Name' or whose 'Age' is bigger than 32 in query), necessarily we are introducing an ever more well confined (contrary to original Somewhere Knowledge conception, but more like indexed note) item based note taking with more meaningful object-oriented approach.
3. (Future ideas)  For **presentation purpose** each item shall have a "layers" property (just like "tags") and it shall be inside multiple layers at same time. Layers can be toggled visible and invisible in document level configuration. Also we intend not to provide any zooming capability yet.






# Contents of dreams are usually random
# Dreams are usually fun and engaging
#* Unless we are in a mental or emotional state which heavily affects what we dream about
#* Dreams are seldom boring

! Notes

1. The entryway of dreamland: 1) Give away all reason and take everything as granted/given; 2) Slip in and immerse; 3) Realize distinction and involve reason, tell reality apart from dreams. 4) Wake up.






* DM = The amount of times we dream of someone - the amount of time we actually hangout with someone
* DM Adjusted = The amount of times we dream of someone with affective feeling afterwards - the amount of items we actually hangout with someone alone (group and safe public activities counts towards friendship and acquaintance and doesn't contribute directly to personal bonds)
* Applies to: Affective Feeling, Romance






With 陈思远、Cheryl (leave early) 

Types of memory association, non-associative

Ground breaking ancient researches, brain wave interaction, illusionary disasters.


Ancient (some 80s) course videos. Large open swimming pool size lecture.

Physician. Old lady ask whether after the course prevent criticality of outdoor sports. Psychology, physics.












* Draft, incomplete, fragmented
* Not presentation ready
* Not detailed or not very specific
* The other quality levels are (which are not explicitly marked): inspiration quality, presentation quality, production quality
* Used for regular journaling purpose, for notes that are just OK to record but not very extensive 






梦境重游、绘梦、梦纪、Dream Era；
Dream Era是故事，是历程，是分享，是片段，强调感情体验。只给她们，说好的每日一则。

! 要求
''故事''

读者要的是故事体验。而不是看我们的笔记。如果你需要表达什么就看故事是否表现力足够（就表现在故事中）。
因此叫做梦纪，而不是梦的笔记。
（也跟今天一个瓶颈有小成有关）
故事要自成一体，完整。

''插画''
插画不求精致，但务必完整，草图的样子不要。风格化可以有，但是画面元素要具体重试。实在不能够细节很完善就半轮廓半写实的绘制也未尝不可。
但是不要看上去就跟草稿一样，要完整。

''????''
故事也有选一个吧，不管是不是全部都很精彩，这样描述的时候才能够投入足够的细节和趣味。

! 设计
Factors，主要是指内容风格：大气，精致，剧情，启发，霸权，英雄，宏伟，忘我，归生，殊死，生活，世界特异，体悟，大爱。。。
例如联想一些具体的例子。 

! 训练
# Observation：
#* What can you remember when you first enter an unfamiliar scene?
#* 这是我们在平时需要训练的重点内容。息息相关的还有对于稍复杂一些的事物基本结构的把握。例如耳机、汽车、宫殿、箱包、衣饰。学会在平时观察和记忆，才会（记梦时）有效果。一种方法是（平时）寻找和手绘复杂结构。
# Imagination：
#* We don't remember every detail about our dream. When try to tell the story/draw the scene, some imagination may be needed. 就好象让你去假想一座城池，不知道如何下手的话。就不可能绘制出动人的场景。

! Ideas
* 设计个梦藏一张她空间图片的样子，可以画出来呵呵。（2014/7/15 夜-2014/7/16晨：因为这个idea在梦中一直纠缠一副画么。。。结果那个梦混乱到极致了。。）

! 综合性挑战
# 20140716
#* idea from：竟然忘了南宫婉长什么样（15日梦）
#* 绘画、记梦挑战：默写出一个妹子的容貌，颜色暂且不要求，但是明暗和结构得准确。

Dream logics are mostly those dreams from an earlier time when [[Dream Perception]]s (as they are called today) are less developed thus cannot really count as [[Dream Inspired]] etc.

The first collection of such happens at ''20170715'' and contains most of below items.

! Contents

Dream Lpgoc可以做个集录：（+合理性解读）

# 不知晓世间一切并非我们的错，但不这样去做则是我们的罪过。
#* 合理性：我们选择是保持无知还是追寻真理；
#* 不合理性：这一段描述诚然利用了一个模糊的“对错”的定义。
# ..
# 你接受我的喜欢，便是最大的善良/宽松/理解/体谅/友善。（待艺术确立）
# 巧合是将毫不关联的独立事件联系起来。
# 巧合就是把两个毫不相关的独立事件联系起来。
#* 合理性：人物内部（self-perception）外部（interpersonal events）都可以这样看待。不代表不完全具有相似性、相关性。从这一角度上来看事物即便相关也可以看做毫不相关，除非是100%完全determinant。
#* 不合理性：完全否认了causality，不过这个玩意儿存在不存在其实也是个争议。
# 醒而欲睡：随意谈恋爱，容易撕心肺裂。
#* 合理性：以不懂得而模仿成人的方式、而不是发展自己的友谊。
#* 不合理性：人们在一开始幼稚的尝试中积累经验也是一种方法，未必总得十分严肃的学习一切。






这个文档本来是打算作为一个“不记录在''Journal''因为忆梦太费事所以就则其紧要记录概念”的功能，但是我后来觉得很有意义把相关的概念都收录下来、与Journal上有所呼应也可，以及通过Recollection把之前的相关内容也给收录最好。这样实现一个''Reference Design''和''Reference Experience''的功能。<br/>
仍然值得保留的是“则其紧要”，强调''画面感''、强调''回忆（细节）''的关键。

! Remark
As per 20160930: 我们的梦中从未出现过''季节特性''和''天气特性''（很早之前的初中时候梦中似乎还有过''雨''，但是后来就很少这种）

1. (Interpretation, P9 writing guidance) (Inspired by 20191124 unrecorded "hide and seek" like dangerous magical encountering "game-like" treasure seeking and battle event with strategy, grouping, collaboration, qualification, betrayal and outdoor and indoor environments and unfamiliar style buildings) At 20191125 morning or late 20191124 night during sleeping this dream suddenly came to me and I realize: ''sometimes it's not even about "love" '' - the memorable moments if being in that world, like as in the Cave dream many years ago - it's just things happening, and it's just "special". ''As if real''.

! Misc.

(20190609, 老妈) 我以前粘人，不知道怎么摆脱一个人的缘份。现在我会拒绝人。

! General

1. "It's not your fault if you don't understand everything" —— 张振华
    * It means "Of course it ''is'' your fault if you don't understand everything, so do it".
    * Like "It's all my fault if you are not happy"
    * It is a 东方哲学风格 "retroactive" expression, meaning you don't take the meaning of it literally
    * If everything is possible, then it's possible that you can do anything, then if you didn't do something that you can do, then it's your decision and thus your fault
    * Similarly, if you can save the world and there is something to save and you didn't, it's your fault.
    * Similarly, ''everything'' can and probably should be blamed on you
2. (20190629; Unrecorded) 大悲咒译文：佛经之受之而用之。佛。。（Lost The second sentence）（恍惚状态）
3. (20190630; Unrecorded) Mom criticized me, "My child, you should learn from your doctorial uncles and aunts." Cousin asked, "What about them? You never mentioned to me?". I replied, (Mean)"I don't even know why she mentioned those people. Those two are completely different things. it's like saying the two dogs I brought home are so naught, it's not like the cows we had at the farm which produces milk. Its not even comparable. So ironic and so funny."
4. What will happen, if one day we will find out, we won't be able to find someone who cares about our dreams? What about the girls you turn your back on - but (with prejudice) are they even worth it?
    * We need to understand we don't turn our back on simply because they are ugly (though that plays certainly an important role), we were not so much a guy caring too much about appearance. But how can you judge a girls kindness, based on limited experience you can have with her?






! ''Topics''
!! 基本问题
* 人既然做梦（By Nature），则为什么会遗忘？（By Nature）我觉得不完全是文化教育的结果、说什么不真实。而是梦的内容、即便我们曾经训练过、一段时间不练习，的确就是不容易想起来。而且回忆梦也成为一个需要练习的行为。这又不太完全像是记忆软件快捷键、有时就算脑海中想不起来，实际开始操作了肌肉记忆会帮助重现过去的熟练度。
* Do we really forget? 有些时候白天时怎么也想不起来丝毫跟昨天的梦相关的内容，躺在床上临睡觉前却会有那样一种''感觉''涌上脑海甚至可以片刻的捕捉更遥远时候的梦境。

!! 梦的演绎
* 列举训练梦所需要的元素，例如对事物结构的细节赏鉴能力，知梦意识，寻常观察静物意识，寻常留意记录和记忆日常细节意识，脑海中精致事物的概念储备，脑海中对精致事物的艺术化重建（创作成型）的经验。
* 列举''回忆梦''所需要的元素，例如''relaxation''、''倒朔''


! ''Concepts''
* [[梦魇]]
* I am OK with forgetting things now, and thus less obsessed with recording all the details; Instead, I am more interested in the capturable details themselves

! ''List of Treatments''
大类放在[[Dream Studies]]，小的主题放在[[Treatments]]好。零散细枝末节放在

C20131129

# background：
# tech：
#* dream journal-dream  note
#* dream sign-signpost, trigger
#* visualization
# 系统方法：
#* relax tech then 入睡
#* 直接入睡
# 知梦方法：（chapeter3）
#* 习惯验梦，扳机
# 经验：
#* practice，
# words and sentences:
#* Thoreau: our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
#* Those who taste, know. 说到这个想起不是什么东西都可以taste的。但是最终是选择要还是不要还是在于个人吧
# 自己的训练想法：
## 来自“look”的主意。看自己身边的世界，这就是梦中（清明梦）基本的视觉感受。（强调代入，将现实代入梦境感受）Feel the reality as if it was in the dream.

<div class="tc-table-of-contents">
<<toc-selective-expandable 'Dream Theory'>>
</div>






> Fully fledgedd dreams are designed in reality.

> It's training in real world that makes things in dreams vivid and sophisticated.

**Aspects**

* [[梦境观察者]]：通过在现实观察各种"Trivial"的布置、场景、人物穿着、对话等细节来增强梦中对于这些元素的敏感度；梦中容易忘什么我们在现实中就去强调观察什么
* [[TI记忆]]
* [[用词扩充]]：自己的一些用语和 词汇量需要扩充，这一部分不通过Redream来专项训练，而是在寻常留心积累

**习得能力**

* [[Recall]]
* [[Recreate]]
* [[TI Imagine]]
* [[Elements of Drawing]]

# Misc Notes

1. (lucid Dream 道具：传送门（20191012未记录梦）“之前一直跟哆啦A梦住在一起没有这种感觉，现在（自己买了这个？？？）带有传送功能，你们（父母）可以夏天到我们那儿去避暑（他们那儿有毒蚊），感觉这种科技真的很厉害”。是那种很“轻易”的传过去就传送了的，不实际，但若使用在梦中，可以是很好的道具。想来哆啦A梦里面其他也可以是很好的道具。






<div class="tc-table-of-contents">

<<toc-selective-expandable 'Dream Understanding'>>

</div>












Intention
Seriousness
Opinion on this
Why I want
Wha I get from this whole set of notes

What exactly is so frightening about privacy? Leaking of personal info, stealing of bank accounts, exposure of genotal parts, unintentional manipulation of personal weakness? We are certainly vulnerable, but what exactly is such vulnerability, ourselves, the environments around us, or the threat of losing proper reputation / job / income in our society? Our data are being tracked, people hold positive and negative opinions about us all the time, so what exactly is the difference between those privacy leaked unaware and those that are a bit more explicit? Where are audiences judges based in moral critiques? In modern world, people (are forced to) gave too many faces -... (Some of them are for professional reasons - of course we cannot expect to go naked on the street and expect everything to function properly in our city.

This is my dream, this is my memory, why do i have to alter it to meet what others, and especially what the society wants? Is it a kind of power we possess so we must be careful with, or is it... Surprisingly this falls into the matter of freedom of speech, and where is the "boundary" of this freedom, or freedom of all kinds in general? In a country like China where people cannot even use Google, vs in a country like America where people can "freely" make fun of their president - do we really appear to have the sort of freedom we talk about?

What can it teach people and what can it teach me? One intention from me donig all those, is to unbias my dreams through diffusion... It's like talking about "private matter" - a teaching from "The Objective Realism's View".
